Text: i download it, used quick par but cant open text and logo2.zip, plz help me how can i open it

Darling, what's the point in publishing par files if the original rar files are not present?
Par files without rar files they are based on cannot be extacted.
Par files are just a repair files of rar files.
Without rar files they are not of much use.
you are a tricky chap.
